name: Proclus Global
description: A powerful corporate conglomerate involved in extraction and security operations in the film 'Inception'.

content.title: Overview
content.body: **Proclus Global** is a multinational corporation specializing in extraction and corporate espionage. They are known for hiring experts to infiltrate the subconscious of targets to extract valuable information.

content.title: History
content.body: Founded as a leading global corporate entity, **Proclus Global** gained notoriety for its involvement in high-stakes extraction operations. Over time, it developed a reputation for employing skilled extractors and providing top-tier security services.

content.title: Structure
content.body: **Proclus Global**'s leadership and membership are shrouded in secrecy. It operates with a strict hierarchy where only a select few are privy to the organization's highest secrets. Their operations are led by highly skilled professionals.

content.title: Operations
content.body: **Proclus Global** employs a team of extractors and security personnel to perform corporate espionage. Their primary method involves using dream-sharing technology to extract or implant information into the subconscious of their targets.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: In the film 'Inception', **Proclus Global** plays a key antagonistic role. The corporation hires Cobb and his team for an inception operation, intending to plant an idea in the mind of a competitor's heir. They are responsible for much of the tension and conflict experienced by the protagonists.
